author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Leon for "HttpClient does not support charset name with quotation mark around" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5787
In current revision, if the 'Content-Type' of http response includes the quotation mark around the charset name, HttpClient throws out unsupported encoding exception.
This patch removes quotation marks from charset name extracted from http response header.

author: kkolinko
msg: Ensure that the ide-eclipse build target downloads all the libraries required by the default Eclipse configuration files.
